snippet: Felix Neureuther of Germany, who struggled at the Olympics after a car crash, recovered to win a World Cup slalom in Kranjska Gora, Slovenia.
abstract: Felix Neureuther of Germany, who struggled at the Olympics after a car crash, recovers to win a World Cup slalom in Kranjska Gora, Slovenia.
lead_paragraph: Felix Neureuther of Germany, who struggled at the Olympics after a car crash, recovered to win a World Cup slalom in Kranjska Gora, Slovenia.
